resources.title: v12.5
resources.md5: MIUI R, MIUI Q, AOSP RS, AOSP Q, AOSP R0, AOSP RS-permissive, AOSP RS-nethunter
changelogs: Merge kernel 4.14.263
Merge CAF LA.UM.9.1.r1-11500.02-SMxxx0.QSSI12.0 (MIUI R/AOSP RS)
mm: hardwire force page_cluster = 1 for zram
nfc: nq-nci: disable nqx_suspend & nqx_resume
Merge MIUI specific Xiaomi's hidden code from evergo-r-oss (MIUI R) *Zram Memory extension * f2fs

resources.title: v16.0
changelogs: Merge kernel 4.4.299, 4.4.300
mm: hardwire force page_cluster = 1 for zram
f2fs: Force nobarrier fsync mode
msm: wlan: update db.txt fixup some countries reg info
Revert dts: remove rcupdate from bootargs
